attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I propose that the ‘e-petition’ website be closed down, as it is abundantly clear that the government has no intention of acting upon any petitions, regardless of the level of support, if the petition conflicts with government dogma.
The website clearly employs the time of several civil servants who no doubt enjoy a very significant salary at taxpayers’ expense, and as the petition facility serves no useful purpose, the removal of the burden of those salaries would be preferable to the continuing farce that is the ‘e-petition’ website.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
